Package ure.math

Class UColor

  • java.lang.Object
    • ure.math.UColor
  • public class UColor
extends java.lang.Object
    UColor implements a mutable RGBA color with color and light mixing. Consider the mutability carefully when passing UColor variables; a UColor you return as a state from an entity could be modified.

      • brightenBy

        public void brightenBy​(float intensity)
        Brighten/darken this color by the float intensity.
        Parameters:
        intensity - Above 1.0 brightens, below 1.0 darkens.

      • addLights

        public void addLights​(UColor light,
                      float intensity)
        Add a colored light to this light. TODO: Make this a more realistic mix.
        Parameters:
        light - The light color to add.
        intensity - The amount of light to add to this light.

      • illuminateWith

        public void illuminateWith​(UColor light,
                           float brightness)
        Illuminate this entity color with a summed colored light. TODO: Make this a more interesting algorithm.
        Parameters:
        light - The sum of colored light illuminating this color.
        brightness - The amount of light to add.
